attributes.action: Give the public more power over their representation.
attributes.additional_details: Presently government, can do as they please for four years, then try and court the public for the last year. I want to force the government to do their best every year, or face the consequences.
attributes.background: Create a mechanism that allows the people to register that they have no confidence in the government. If a trigger value is met a general election is forced, regardless of the fixed term.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603106
